American Union (A.U.).Military: Extremely powerful, slightly above Jonah's military.
American Union (A.U.).Other Information: Representatives are 1/100,000 of the combined union population. Members must follow all AUTs and entities defined by the AUTs (such as departments and representatives), and are taxed 5% monthly for the Union to give to foreign nations, spend towards the union and its nations, or put into reserve.

Calidum Union.Military: Very strategic and almost Jonah-level military.
Calidum Union.Other Information: Similar to Jonah’s Colony in terms of innovation, industries and government, after the Union’s territory was conquered by John Sith and split into many countries. See DGD-B CA.C21JN - WHO WE ARE and DGD-B CA.C21JU - THE CALIDUM UNION.

Post War Arjun and Calidum States (PWACI.Military: Uses Calidum Union military + Arjun’s Colony military for a Jonah level military.
Post War Arjun and Calidum States (PWACI.Other Information: Nations pay taxes to the nation/union that gave them independence. These nations must also supply additional financial or military aid to their parent nation/union when the nation/union requests it. Military aid amount is decided by the PWACIS, and financial aid is usually up to the nation and can be as low as $1000, but rarely, PWCAIS can force up to a 10% wealth contribution. In return, nations can choose to vote in their parent nation’s elections, and PWACIS supplies great military and financial defense to the member nations from Calidum and Arjun’s Colony.

Desemar.Military: Tiny military. Will attempt to move Japan and deliver treaties by missiles during times of war. Mainly focuses on research for the war.
Desemar.Location/Land: Southwest Northern America (except Texas, California, Wyoming + panhandle), as well as Mexico and western Asian Russia.
Desemar.Other Information: One of the three A.U. founders. Known for risky feats (moving Japan, spending everything on a moon mission) and massive technological advances (solar farm).

Medilli.Military: Rusty, trusty, dusty, crusty, busty, gusty, lusty, and musty military.
Medilli.Other Information: Made from Cameron’s colony after Kye bought it. Special government structure with no leader, but instead a senate, direct voting by the people, and a court.

Couria.Military: Technologically and strategically advanced nonviolent sub-Calidum military.
Couria.Other Information: Made from Cameron’s colony after Kye bought it. Known for economic stability, having amazing business and trade cities.

Jonah’s Colony.Military: The ultimate nation military, only surpassed by the A.U. itself.
Jonah’s Colony.Location/Land: Hawaii and Asia (except New Guinea, Indian Subcontinent + Afghanistan, Sumatra, Borneo, Indochina excluding Vietnam and Laos, Japan, Korea, Taiwan, and the middle east except the east Arabian Peninsula).
Jonah’s Colony.Other Information: Cut ties with the Jonah Empires long ago. Known for a large landmass, high wealth, leading a former empire, and farming. Recently lost a lot of land to Calidum and the Arjun states.

Rivertopia.Military: Large sized and very modern military, used to defeat Lake.
Rivertopia.Location/Land: Southern Oceania excluding Australia and the Caribbean.
Rivertopia.Other Information: For the colony’s collapse, see AUT 9 and its two subtreaties. One of the three A.U. founders.

Arjun’s Colony.Military: Modern and very large army, along with an air force and cyber force. Sub-Jonah level.
Arjun’s Colony.Location/Land: South Australia, Indian subcontinent + Afghanistan, middle northwestern Africa, Wyoming + panhandle, and SoCal.
Arjun’s Colony.Other Information: Powerful, developing, and very progressive nation, known for quick change and the Vulture party. Re-created 2024.11.05 (see AUT 13 for more info).

Colony Freezing.Other Information: No longer related to the Freezing Empire. See THE FREEZING ELECTIONS (DGD LIST) for elections.

United Cold Nation.Military: Uses a small but very effective peaceful military, trying not to resort to violence.
United Cold Nation.Location/Land: Northwest North America excluding the most northwest.
United Cold Nation.Other Information: See THE UCN ELECTIONS (DGD LIST). Known for these elections, which can affect the course of the entire American Union.

Cogitium 2.0.Leader: Frazier Barton and Tridiv the Great
Cogitium 2.0.Military: 300K titanium AI bots as well as carbon fiber-armored humans with powered exoaskeletons.
Cogitium 2.0.Other Information: Created by AustraGPT 3.0 as a “tech supercenter”, but the country was taken over by the human Frazier Barton to widen scope and AustraGPT now owns the company Cogitium only. Frazier Barton recently appointed Tridiv as a co-leader after there was a strong movemment for more power and military inside thet country. 200K bots currently working in places outside the military.

Muzak Republic.Other Information: Formerly the Non-Empire led by Jared Muzak, only taking land if the people allowed it and started no wars, following AUT 6. When the empire fell they lost a lot of their power, then changed to be a republic led by Harry Muzak.

Great Routira.Other Information: Oldest civilization still around. Their people moved from Australia to Asia to South America, and now finally back to Australia. Language has no vowels, so transliteration of names is weird. Very different from Routia, which stayed in South America. See AUT 1.1 for more info. Technically under PWACIS, as the eastern province made an agreement for $1T in investment so that Arjun would get 5% taxes for the rich and 0.5% for the middle class as well as PWACIS control in the province.

Nacu.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 5% taxes to Arjun.

Sacu.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 10% taxes to Arjun.

Infrigor.Location/Land: Alaska but going east ¼ the way to the east coast.
Infrigor.Other Information: Formerly Cold Place Thing. Home to beautiful landscapes and mountains in the far north. Name means “In the cold” in Latin. Made an agreement for $1.5T in investment so that Kye would get 7% of proceeds.

The Kameropotamias.Other Information: Not recognized by Cameron due to a long-standing territory dispute, although the NCT does recognize them. Not recognized by Jonah due to a similar dispute. Recognized by River despite a territory dispute. They are known for their diverse European culture.

New Cameron Territory.Military: Medium sized, strong, and stable military!
New Cameron Territory.Other Information: Formerly owned by Cameron, one of the three A.U. founders. Cameron gave up the nation after he left the A.U., so the nation reformed under Lohan Thea. Technically under PWACIS, as the Portugal province made an agreement for $6T in investment so that Arjun would get 12% of proceeds, PWACIS control in the province, and some government power.

Hippity.Location/Land: Western non-mainland Europe, including Iceland and the British Isles.
Hippity.Other Information: Created when Kye’s Colony and the NCT split up their territories. A symbolic continuation of the Hippity Hoppity civilization that lasted over 2 thousand years before being conquered by the Jonahs. Made an agreement for $1T in investment so that Kye would get 5% of proceeds.

Routira-Bredian Democracy.Other Information: Created when Kye’s Colony and the NCT split up their territories. Technically under PWACIS, as the North Italy province made an agreement for $3.5T in investment so that Arjun would get 10% of proceeds, PWACIS control in the province, and some government power.

European Cultural Union.Other Information: Formerly True Middle Place. Created when Kye’s Colony and the NCT split up their territories. Known for diverse cultures, similar to The Kameropotamias. Made an agreement for $1T in investment so that NCT would get 7% of proceeds.

Scandinavia But Better.Military: Tiny military if you don’t count fishing ships that can be repurposed.
Scandinavia But Better.Other Information: Their motto is “unio in montibus et in campis et mare”. Created when Kye’s Colony and the NCT split up their territories. Made an agreement for $1.5T in investment so that NCT would get 10% of proceeds. Rebel Man recently retired and is now replaced by the acting president River Lozada. He promises more funding for education, infrastructure, and Scandinavian furniture.

Peninsular Island.Military: New fresh military with navy! But no air force currently.
Peninsular Island.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. The eastern side contains a large tech center while the western is more focused on nature. Pays 1% taxes to Arjun.

Middle Guinea.Military: New military but still has some rusty old tanks!
Middle Guinea.Location/Land: Western middle section of New Guinea.
Middle Guinea.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Mostly focused on preserving nature, especially in cities. Pays 1% taxes to Arjun.

Tribal Confederacy.Military: Still has an old military. Mostly bows and arrows.
Tribal Confederacy.Location/Land: Eastern middle section of New Guinea.
Tribal Confederacy.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Focused on keeping tribal lands and going back to the times of the past. Made out of mini-states dedicated to each tribe. Pays 1% taxes to Arjun.

Vitamonte.Military: Modern military, no war monkeys or navy unfortunately.
Vitamonte.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Name means life + volcanos. Pays 1% taxes to Arjun.

Sequoia.Military: Small military currently. Developing navy and more.
Sequoia.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Popular tourist destination because of its redwoods and sequoias. Pays 5% taxes to Arjun.

Siddartha.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 10% taxes to Arjun.

Chola Republic.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 8% taxes to Arjun.

East Asian Democracy.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 15% taxes to Arjun.

South Calidum.Military: Uses the Calidum Union military as its own.
South Calidum.Location/Land: Northeast Africa down to the middle.
South Calidum.Other Information: Part of the Calidum Union and PWAICS.

Middle Calidum.Military: Uses the Calidum Union military as its own.
Middle Calidum.Other Information: Part of the Calidum Union and PWAICS.

North Calidum.Military: Uses the Calidum Union military as its own.
North Calidum.Location/Land: Middle East excluding the Arabian Peninsula & Persia.
North Calidum.Other Information: Part of the Calidum Union and PWAICS.

East Calidum.Military: Uses the Calidum Union military as its own.
East Calidum.Location/Land: Persia, stopping at the Persian Gulf.
East Calidum.Other Information: Part of the Calidum Union and PWAICS.

Routia.Other Information: Growing power. This is the Routia that did not move back to Australia, while Great Routira did.

New Emeio.Military: New modern military with a small navy.
New Emeio.Other Information: Formerly arguably the least developed country, now a major tech center with a new government after Arjun's “invasion”, supplying supercomputers and technology parts. In a new agreement with Cogitium following the recent surge of Tridiv, investing in each other.

Colony Hot.Military: Large military, still a bit old but very stable and modern compared to neighbours.
Colony Hot.Location/Land: In Africa, east of New Emeio.
Colony Hot.Other Information: Largest and second most developed African country.

Billy.Location/Land: In Africa, south of Colony Hot.
Billy.Other Information: Used to have more land, but they merged with Colony Hot and when the Non-Empire conquered the modern-day territory and fell, they became  with new borders.

Bun Pik.Other Information: Currently in the Muzak Dynasty, an era ruled by former Non-Empire officials.

Chainah.Military: Medium sized but very old military.
Chainah.Location/Land: In Africa, east of Bun Pik.
Chainah.Other Information: Quite a respectable economy for its size despite conquerings from Calidum, possibly due to proximity with it.

Terratoo.Military: Small and very old military except for the navy.
Terratoo.Other Information: Previously part of Chainah, but split from Chainah and was able to avoid Calidum and the Non-Empire’s conquest.

New Ævolo.Military: Modern and medium sized military, inherited from the Non-Empire.
New Ævolo.Location/Land: In Africa, south of Bun Pik.
New Ævolo.Other Information: Quite different from the old, more corrupt, Ævolo, having a Non-Empire based culture and government.
